name: Mosaic NetworX
overview:
Mosaic NetworX LLC is a communications service provider (CSP) specializing in network solutions that decrease complexity and cost, while optimizing performance and capacity. To achieve this, the Company has developed a proprietary supply-chain management methodology that solves the chronic industry inefficiencies in the Pricing, Procurement and Provisioning of network services. Combined with our industry-standard, White-Glove service delivery process, both enterprise and carrier wholesale customers are assured world-class, post-sales support.

Additionally, Mosaic NetworX LLC is an authorized Competitive Local Exchange Carrier (CLEC) in 20 states, providing facility-based, origination and termination services.
